doc:
Steve Valentine https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Steve_Valentine 0 Steve Valentine (born 26 October 1966) is a Scottish-American actor, musician, and magician who has performed on stage and screen but who is best known for his role as the eccentric Nigel Townsend on NBC's crime drama Crossing Jordan and as Harry Flynn in the critically acclaimed PlayStation 3 game Uncharted 2: Among Thieves as well as the voice of Alistair in BioWare's Dragon Age franchise. He also starred in the Disney XD sitcom I'm in the Band as Derek Jupiter until its 2011 cancellation. Steve_Valentine ( born_26_October_1966 ) is a_Scottish-American_actor , musician , and magician who has_performed on stage_and_screen but who is_best_known for his_role as the_eccentric_Nigel_Townsend on NBC 's_crime_drama_Crossing_Jordan and as Harry Flynn in the_critically_acclaimed_PlayStation_3_game_Uncharted_2 : Among_Thieves as_well_as the_voice of Alistair in BioWare 's_Dragon_Age_franchise . He also starred in the_Disney_XD_sitcom I 'm in the_Band as Derek_Jupiter until its_2011_cancellation .
